required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Application of Standardized Cleaning and Disinfection Mode of HFT Surface in Hospital Infection Prevention and Control
clinical_study.official_title: Application of Multi-center Unified High-frequency Contact Surface Standardized Cleaning and Disinfection Mode in Hospital Infection Prevention and Control in ICU

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

collaborator.agency: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Jiaxing University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: The scientific, feasible and effective mode of standardized cleaning and disinfection of ICU high-frequency contact surfaces is discussed and verified.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a multi-center unified interventional study, using the front and rear control method, it is proposed to improve the ICU traditional cleaning and disinfection method on the basis of the ICU high-frequency contact surface status survey, explore the best frequency and disinfection method of ICU high-frequency contact surface cleaning and disinfection, establish a multi-center unified ICU high-frequency contact surface standardized cleaning and disinfection mode, in order to achieve the ideal cleaning and disinfection effect, effective prevention and control of ICU hospital infection occurrence and transmission.

primary_outcome.description: the difference of Incidence of hospital infections

arm_group.description: In accordance with the "intensive care unit hospital infection prevention and control norms" requirements
Implement a multi-center unified ICU high-frequency contact surface standardized cleaning and disinfection mode

intervention.intervention_name: cleaning and disinfection mode for surfaces with high frequency contact
intervention.description: According to the results of the survey on the status of high frequency contact surface, the corresponding frequency and method of cleaning and disinfection are determined. Set up a multidisciplinary quality control team.
clean the high frequency contact surface like other surfaces

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- High-frequency contact with the surface of an object by ICU patients and their surroundings; informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Admission < 24 hours; < 18 years old; hospital infection prior to admission to the ICU.

overall_official.affiliation: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University
